segments.text: What are the pop groups that you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , there are so many good ones ! I loved the Spice Girls . They were so cool !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree ! I cried for a week when they broke up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was really sad too , but at least I can still listen to their Cds .
segments.speaker: S2
